Package citicide.mvc.controller

Class Controller

  • java.lang.Object
    • citicide.mvc.controller.Controller
  • public class Controller
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the Controller class from the citicide.mvc.controller package This is class facilitates the creation of objects according to the view's necessities
    Author:
    Jorge Blanco Rey jorge.blancor@estudiante.uam.es, Angel Casanova Bienzobas angel.casanova@estudiante.uam.es, S. Xiao Fernández Marín sofiax.fernandez@estudiante.uam.es

        iD - , the user ID
        passwd - , the password of the new user
        passwd2 - , the password of the new user that must match with passwd

        Returns:

                                   User manager,

                                   Group father)
                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        This method creates a new subgroup
        Parameters:
        name - of the subgroup
        manager - of the subgroup
        description - , description of the subgroup
        father - , the group that is in the upper level of this one
        Returns:

        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - when it has passed an illegal argument

      • InfrastructureProjectController

        public InfrastructureProject InfrastructureProjectController​(java.lang.String name,
                                                             java.lang.String proponent,
                                                             java.lang.String description,
                                                             java.lang.Double moneyRequested,
                                                             java.lang.String district,
                                                             java.lang.String picturePath)
        This method creates a new infrastructure project
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the project
        proponent - the nickname of the user who has created the project
        description - the description of the project with a maximum of 500 characters
        moneyRequested - the money that the proponent is asking for to accomplish the project
        district - the place where the project is going to be performed
        picturePath - path where the picture of the project can be found
        Returns:
        the new infrastructure project created

      • socialProjectController

        public SocialProject socialProjectController​(java.lang.String name,
                                             java.lang.String proponent,
                                             java.lang.String description,
                                             java.lang.Double moneyRequested,
                                             java.lang.String addressedTo,
                                             Scope scope)
        This method creates a new social project
        Parameters:
        name - the name of the project
        proponent - the nickname of the user who has created the project
        description - the description of the project with a maximum of 500 characters
        moneyRequested - the money that the proponent is asking for to accomplish the project
        addressedTo - the social group who is the target of the project
        scope - whether it is national or international
        Returns:
        the new social project created
